id: Curated: All the essential tools to explore digital landscape, inside Notion.
name: Curated: All the essential tools to explore digital landscape, inside Notion.
description: More than 900+ people have bought it so far, get yourself one and start creating!I come across curated directories(many times) while they are helpful, they can also be overwhelming amount of info to handle.These are the same tools I used when I tried making/creating anything whether it was my podcast(which I had to stop for some reason)/Video-editing/photo-editing/creating AR experiences.In the notion doc, I try to simplify the process by letting a person decide from a set of 2/3 tools rather th
